content:
That sounds like a great hobby! I'd be happy to help you find information about the bird sanctuary you're planning to visit. Can you please provide me with more details about the sanctuary, such as its name or location? That way, I can try to find more specific information about it.

Also, congratulations on getting out to bird watch at least once a week! That's a great way to improve your skills and spot new species. What's been your favorite birding experience so far? Have you seen any rare or exciting species recently?
